alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 16 at 2:24PM MST until January 18 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations 1 to 3 inches, with 3 to 7 inches across the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected. Areas of blowing and drifting snow will impact Whitebird Hill Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region
